frontmatter.title: Weigh risks personally
frontmatter.description: Weigh personal risks. Don't rely on general guidelines, especially with irreversible consequences.

frontmatter.title: Set clear guidelines
frontmatter.description: It's not right to expect others to understand boundaries. The stakes are high and bad habits lead to unintended consequences.
